article-meta.issue-title: Special Issue on Governing Pension Fund Capitalism in Times of Uncertainty

body.p: The editors of Global Social Policy wish to thank the referees (listed below) for their manuscript reviews, and two of the regional editors, Adebayo Olukoshi (Africa) and Rosalia Cortés (Latin America), for expertly translating the journal’s article abstracts. We appreciate your voluntary contributions to volume 12 of the journal!
Jimi Adesina, Rhodes University, South Africa
Pertti Alasuutari, University of Tampere, Finland
